headline: Citigroup Arm Enters Deal to Exit Consumer Banking Business in Poland
summary: C's arm announces a deal to transfer Polish consumer banking unit to VeloBank, aligning with its global retail exit strategy.

headline: Citi sells Polish consumer business to VeloBank
summary: Upon closing, it will be the 10th international consumer business Citi has sold since 2021. The bank will maintain its institutional business in Poland, as it has elsewhere, following the sale.
